Suitable for vegetarians. Canadian maple syrup. Long, long ago the first people of the land that is now Canada discovered that when they pierced the bark of the Maple tree a magnificent sticky, sweet liquid trickled out. They tasted it.""It's Gud!""they thought. They tapped the trees using Reed Funnels and collected the flowing golden sap. Turning it into a delicious syrup. All they needed was a name. Naturally they called it 'Sinzibuckwud'. meaning 'drawn from wood'. Not much has changed in the way Maple syrup is produced today. Pure from tree to table. We call ours Buckwud. www.facebook.com/buckwudmaplesyrup

The Cuvée RoséLaurent-Perrier was created in 1968 using bold, innovative \u2018savoir-faire\u2019 methods learnt from production of still wines called \u2018Coteaux Champenois\u2019. Perfected at each stage of its making, the Cuvée Roséis now the benchmark in its category. Held in an elegant wine bottle inspired by King Henri IV, this roséchampagne has been widely acknowledged for its consistent high quality for more than 40 years. Cuvée Roséwas born in 1968 of the bold experimentation and know-how of Laurent-Perrier. Driven by a constant search for perfection at every step in its elaboration, Cuvée Roséquickly established its reputation as a work of art with inimitable style. Diet Coke - The lighter Coke taste. Celebrating all things fashion, fun and fabulous. Diet Coke adds some sparkle to your day. Diet Coke is a sparkling low calorie soft drink with vegetable extracts and sweeteners. Suitable for vegetarians and vegans. Gluten free, dairy free, nut free. Diet Coke - the lighter Coke taste. Coke is a great-tasting, refreshing soft drink that has provided moments of uplift and happiness every day for over 125 years. Things have changed a lot since Dr. John S. Pemberton invented Coca-Cola in 1886 in Atlanta, Georgia, but not the great taste of Coca-Cola. Today Coke is refreshing more people than ever before, with 1.6 billion servings of Coca-Cola sold in over 200 countries every day, but the same promise of optimism that Coke offered back in 1886 still endures. Coca-Cola and the Environment. Coca-Cola is committed to making a positive difference - to the health of the planet, consumers and the communities it serves. The company is working hard to reduce its impact on the environment in everything it does - growing more while using less in areas such as energy andwater use, waste reduction and recycling - and by encouraging people to think more about the positive impact they can have on their local environment. The International Wine&Spirit Competition - Spirit 2005 Gold. International Spirits Challenge 2005 - Distiller of the year. International Spirits Challenge 2006 - Distiller of the year. Distilled and matured in the Valley of the Deer where the distillery has stood since 1887. 12 years old. Over time our signature malt develops complex rounded flavours with elegant notes of fresh pear and subtle oak. The Glenfiddich 12 Year Old is our signature single malt Scotch whisky. Made by the Distiller of the Year 2005 and 2006, Glenfiddich 12 Year Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky has been awarded a gold medal by the prestigious International Wine and Spirit Competition. In 1886, William Grant set out create the""best dram in the valley""Within a year he had built his distillery in The Glen of Fiddich, Gaelic for The Valley of the Deer. The first spirit flowed from the stills on Christmas Day 1887. The""best dram in the valley""still flows four generations later. The Grant family and the community of expert craftsmen at The Glenfiddich Distillery continue William Grant's original philosophy, preserving time honoured methods as well as exploring new possibilities in single malt Scotch whisky making. To find out more about the Glenfiddich Single Malt Scotch Whisky range and history of The Glenfiddich Distillery, please visit our website. www.glenfiddich.com

product.productDescription: Certified Ben Tre clams. Naturally high in iron and vitamin B12. Responsibly sourced. Healthy option. Our Bén TréClams have been cooked in a vacuum bag to maintain their fresh juicy taste. Healthy Option. Clams are naturally high in Vitamin B12, Iron and Selenium. Selenium contributes to the normal function of the immune system, while Vitamin B12 and Iron contribute to the formation of normal red blood cells and a energy-yielding metabolism. Clams are also low in fat so are a perfect ingredient to reinvigorate your good intentions. Vacuum Pouch. Our clams have been specifically cooked in a vacuum pouch to keep their juiciness and flavour and to ensure that they stay in their best condition until use. It also allows you to see exactly what you are buying. Responsibly Sourced. These Vietnamese Clams are from the Bén Tréfishery that has been MSC certified since early 2009. They are gathered by hand using regulated rakes and nets that allow undersized clams to escape. Mechanical harvesting is banned to protect the species and the environment.

product.productName: Big Prawn Company big & juicy tiger prawns -
product.productDescription: Responsibly sourced. Whole uncooked tiger prawns. Our Big&Juicy Tiger Prawns are a high source of Selenium, an essential mineral that helps to maintain an effective immune system. Tiger prawns are also low in fat so are the perfect ingredient to reinvigorate your good intentions. It is recommended that you eat two portions of seafood a week. Prawns are a great way to contribute to this. 5-10m2. Stocking practice. Our Big&Juicy Tiger Prawns come from a farm that uses very low stocking densities so the prawns have freedom to swim around in a natural environment. This ensures a less stressed, perfect quality prawn with a fantastic texture and taste. Environmental statement. ""Our Madagascan supplier has made a significant commitment to the sustainability of their farming operations through their aquaculture practices and improvement in the lives and living conditions of their employees and local communities. They work closely with NGOs and continuously look to improvement with new emerging standards"".
Responsibly farmed. Boneless. Grill from frozen in 12 minutes

In the shell! - simply thaw, peel&eat. Quick and easy luxury. A healthy option. Luxury shellfish medley consisting of scored brown crab knuckle and claw, half shell mussels, headless king prawns and shell-on coldwater prawns. Brown crab claws (Cancer Pagurus). Our Big&Juicy crab comes from the 'Orkney Fisherman's Society', a cooperative of largely inshore fisherman who catch using pots around the islands of Orkney. The 70 or so islands and skerries which make up the Orkney archipelago has over 500 miles of coastline all within 30 miles of the factory in Stromness. The Orkney name has become synonymous with the highest quality and sustainable fishing. Our commitment to you also means that we have had each claw scored so that the hard work of cracking them has already been done for you. Blue mussels (Mytilus Chilensis). Our Big&Juicy blue mussels are cultivated on hanging ropes in the storm sheltered bays of the beautiful Chilean Island of Chiloe in the South Pacific. The Humboldt current that sweeps up from Antarctica feeds these bays with a plentiful source of plankton and nutrients ensuring a superior mussel. To make it easy for you to pick off the mussel meat with your fork, we have removed one half of the shell. King prawns (Penaeus vannamei). Our Big&Juicy King prawns come from a group of prawn farms located in an isolated region in the Lampung province of Southern Sumatra, Indonesia. This fertile, volcanic, region of Indonesia makes for excellent farming of prawns and the sustainable farming practices adopted by the farmers ensures maximum care for the environment and the community. These prawns have been cooked in their shell which ensures the best flavour and texture and we have scored along the back of each prawn to make them easy to peel. Coldwater prawns (Pandalus Borealis). These Big&Juicy prawns are caught from the very northern waters of the Atlantic from Canada, Greenland and Norway and when the season is right from the Arctic Ocean around the Svalbard Islands. Located halfway between Norway and the North Pole the Svalbard region offers untouched Arctic wilderness that yields the best prawns with the pinkest colour available. The prawns are whole and have been cooked immediately after catching. They are then frozen within minutes ensuring the flavour and wholesomeness is locked in. The shell is soft so can be easily peeled with your fingers. A Healthy Option. Naturally high in Vitamin B2, phosphorous and selenium. Vitamin B2 plays an important role in the production of red blood cells, phosphorus is necessary for cell metabolism and continual health of our bones, while selenium is an essential mineral that helps to maintain an effective immune system. Our luxury shellfish is also low in fat so is a perfect ingredient to reinvigorate your good intentions. Quick and Easy Luxury. Finest Quality Since 1907. Vanilla, the most popular flavour in the world, originated in Mexico. Brought to Europe about 1520 by the explorer Cortez, it was first used only in conjunction with cacao beans in a drink called Chocolati. Since 1602 it has been enjoyed as a flavour by itself. Grown mainly in Madagascar and Indonesia, as well as other minor areas, the vanilla bean, or pod, is the only edible fruit-bearing orchid. Each flower, open only one day a year, must be hand pollinated to produce a pod which requires a labour intensive 3-6 month curing process to develop full flavour. About 5 pounds of harvested pods produce only 1 pound of cured pods. Our exclusive cold process method extracts the essence from selected vanilla pods, the finest obtainable, producing rich and delicious flavour that is unsurpassed. Use and enjoy! . Alcohol 35%.

Use it for making traditional favourites such as custards, ice cream, gelato and crème brûlée, or to enhance whip cream, cakes and icings. Our exclusive cold-process method extracts the essence from selected Madagascar Bourbon vanilla beans. Thisessence is combined with vanilla bean seeds and infused into a thickened base, creating a Pure Vanilla Bean Paste with an intense, delicious flavour that retains the full bouquet of pure vanilla.

Resealable. Less mess. Easy to store. Stays fresh. Let me introduce myself - I'm Fred chief flour grader at Homepride flour. I've been helping Great Britain get baking for fifty years. Hello! Back in the 60'swhen I first started in this job, it was all about the perfect pineapple upside down cake. These days, cute cupcakes are the trendy bake. Over the years I've become a bit of a baking celebrity, lending myself to everything from flour sifters to egg timers - a great range of collectable kitchen kit for bakes across the land. Some of my classic collectables are still available and we're adding new items all the time. See what's available on my website and I can look forward to saying hello in person to you sometime soon! Happy baking. Great Britain! Fred

The Story of Thomas J Fudge. In 1916, our great-great-uncle, Thomas J Fudge, a dapper chap with a distinctive moustache, opened a bakery. A rather remarkable bakery in beautiful, bountiful Dorset. His buns were buttery. His bread was brilliant. His biscuits were the business. And over 90 years later, we - his family tree - are continuing his remarkable, edible work.
